member.name: Windows.MFDeserializeAttributesFromStream
member.summary: Loads attributes from a stream into an attribute store.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the attribute store.
Bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.
Pointer to the IStream interface of the stream from which to read the attributes.

returns.para: The function returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: Windows.MFSerializeAttributesToStream
member.summary: Writes the contents of an attribute store to a stream.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the attribute store.
Bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.
Pointer to the IStream interface of the stream where the attributes are saved.

returns.para: The function returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
